pages.text: $(thing)Swords$() are the most basic of all weapon types, but they are also the most versatile.$(br)Because of this, they are likely to be the first weapon type you use when playing. This also comes at a cost, however, as $(thing)swords$() do not offer much in the way of protection.
pages.title: Swords

pages.text: With a sword, it's expected that you will be right in the face of a fight, at arm's reach of the enemy.$(br)This can put you at risk of taking some hits yourself, but also comes with some of the highest damage potential across all weapon types.$(br2)It's generally a good idea to keep a sword on you at all times for when things get quick and dirty, or you need a quick escape.
$(thing)Swords$() are the most versatile weapon type in the game.
pages.title: A Sword

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)swords$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
